title: To Astrapaios Zeus
lines: I call upon great and pure, upon resounding and illustrious, upon ethereal and blazing Zeus, whose racing fire shines through the air.
Your light flashes through the clouds with an ear-splitting clap.
O horrid, O wrathful and pure, O invincible god, lord of lightning, I call upon you, O begetter of all, O great king, to be kind and to bring a sweet end to my life.
